title: Every Other Friday feat. Melora Hardin and Gildart Jackson
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Part one of our special summer series with the Boston Symphony Orchestra, Melora Hardin and Gildart Jackson co-star in this tale about a crafty countess who teaches a broke baker never to look a gift horse in the mouth.
itunes:author: WBUR
itunes:title: Every Other Friday feat. Melora Hardin and Gildart Jackson
